source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 16,851 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

name: Talisman of True Treasure Tracking
description: Wearing this, one might find the rarest of items in the most mundane of locales!

spells.description: Use: Be the center of attention. (10 Sec Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 101,334 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Agility by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
